attributes.title: Absurd!!!
attributes.review: I am all for Trump 2020 but this app is just outwardly glitchy! I opened that app and all of a sudden a fat man in a bunny suit flooded my screen!! I tried to click away but every time I touched the screen he licked my finger. I was disgusted and threw up multiple times. This app has given me a stomach Virus and I am at a loss! How can I support my amazingly, handsome, orange president when this app is giving me cancer!? I mean a stomach virus!? Forgive my my king, my god, my savior President Trump, but I cannot take this app any longer. My stomach simply cannot take it.
